text: nabivaraya ohuge biriyangen ætæmekuta katavak rahasin kiyu avasthave ek biriyaku (an aya veta) eya danva siti kalhi (mese rahasa helidarav vima) allah eya nabivaraya veta heli kaleya. in kotasak nabivaraya æyata danva sita kotasak nosalaka hæriyeya. ohu eya æyata danva siti kalhi “meya obata danva sitiye kavudæyi” æya æsuvaya. “abhignanavantavu sarva gnaniyano mata dænum dunneya”yæyi ohu pævasiya
